inclusion.criterion: free light chain values >100 mg/L for k chains or >50 mg/L for lambda chains.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: fistula or central venous catheter with blood flow >250 ml/min.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: dialysis, multiple myeloma requiring the double PMMA filter application, poly-allergy, HIV positivity
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has been diagnosed with Wegener's granulomatosis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. He has a positive serum MPO-ANCA.
